text: Bright Eyes is a 1929 British-Austrian romance film directed by Géza von Bolváry and starring Betty Balfour, Jack Trevor, and Fritz Greiner.BFI.org It is also known under the alternative title of Champagner. The film was a co- production between British International Pictures and Sascha-Film. Bolváry directed the film after travelling to Britain to make The Wrecker and stayed on to make another film, The Vagabond Queen, before returning to Germany. ==Cast== ==References== ==Bibliography== * ==External links== * Category:Austrian films Category:1929 films Category:British films Category:1929 romance films Category:Films directed by Géza von Bolváry Category:German-language films Category:British black-and-white films Category:Films with screenplays by Franz Schulz Category:Austrian black-and- white films Category:Austrian romance films Category:British romance films
title: Bright Eyes (1929 film)
